description: This table contains the history of referrals linked to AP claims. Amounts and counts calculated during adjudication when these referrals were attached to the AP claim are also included.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim info record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the referral previously associated with this claim.

columns.name: VISIT_COUNT
columns.description: The visit count for this referral when it was linked to the AP claim.

columns.name: ADJUD_AMT
columns.description: The adjudicated dollar amount for this referral when it was linked to the AP claim.

columns.name: PAID_AMT
columns.description: The paid dollar amount for this referral when it was linked to the AP claim.

columns.name: RFL_ATTACH_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The historical referral attachment source category ID for the AP claim.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Adjudication Referral Matching


Manual


EDI Claim File
